title: Gather Requirements
description: Define the functional and non-functional requirements for the AtmosphericWaterGenerator, including user needs, performance expectations, and design constraints.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AtmosphericWaterGenerator project. This will include the design of hardware components, software modules, their interactions, and addressing the following aspects: air intake and filtration, dehumidification and condensation, water storage and purification, user interface, power management, connectivity (optional), maintenance and serviceability, safety and fail-safe mechanisms, regulatory compliance. Special attention will be given to energy efficiency, durability, affordability, and ease of use. The design should consider the dependencies 'Gather Requirements' and prioritize accordingly. It is recommended to break down the task into smaller subtasks for easier implementation. Also, consider using modular design principles for future scalability and upgradability. To ensure a comprehensive design, it would be beneficial to involve multi-disciplinary experts such as mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, software developers, and UI/UX designers. The design documentation should include detailed diagrams, flowcharts, and prototypes.

title: Develop Air Intake and Filtration Module
description: Design and implement the module responsible for drawing in air and filtering out contaminants.

title: Develop Water Condensation and Collection Module
description: Design and implement the module responsible for condensing water vapor from the filtered air and collecting the resulting water.

title: Develop User Interface and Control Module
description: Design and implement the user interface and control module for the device, including input/output mechanisms and user settings.

title: Implement Data Storage and Logging
description: Design and implement the data storage and logging mechanisms for the device, including usage data, performance metrics, and error logs.

title: Develop Device Firmware and Embedded Software
description: Develop the firmware and embedded software required to control the hardware components and integrate the software modules.
dependencies: Develop Air Intake and Filtration Module
Develop Water Condensation and Collection Module
Develop User Interface and Control Module

title: Design and Implement Comprehensive Security Measures (Revised)
description: Perform a thorough analysis of potential security risks in the Atmospheric Water Generator. Propose robust security measures to safeguard device security, user data privacy, IoT connectivity, and network resilience. Include guidelines for secure design principles, encryption methods (AES-256, RSA), access control mechanisms (user authentication, authorization, and accountability), and industry-standard best practices for securing similar devices (such as OWASP IoT Top 10). Provide recommendations on regular security updates and patch management. Highlight the importance of secure-by-design approach and defense-in-depth strategy. Suggest integrating vulnerability scanning tools and penetration testing into the development process from early stages, not just during final testing. If necessary, propose additional measures to mitigate emerging threats such as AI-based threat detection and response systems. Upon completion, perform a security audit to verify the effectiveness of implemented measures. Update this RFC with the findings and suggested improvements based on the audit. Provide documentation for the implemented security solutions to facilitate future maintenance and updates.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Define the testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, and develop test cases to ensure the device's functionality and reliability.

title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment Pipeline
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline to automate the build, testing, and deployment processes.
dependencies: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases

title: Create User Documentation and Support Materials
description: Develop user manuals, installation guides, and other support materials to assist users in setting up and using the device.
dependencies: Develop User Interface and Control Module
